tasks.task: Inserting 8mm PP thread on a sewing machine
subtasks: Thread the needle of a sewing machine with an 8mm PP thread.
Align the thread correctly through the sewing machine's needle.
Adjust any tension settings on the sewing machine as needed.
Monitor the machine while sewing to ensure thread is feeding properly.

tasks.task: Using a plane to mill the surface of the log
subtasks: Position the log against the plane's fence.
Adjust the plane's depth to mill the desired thickness.
Push the log through the plane using steady pressure.
Verify the plane is cutting correctly and adjust as necessary.
Repeat the process for the desired number of passes.

tasks.task: Attaching door latch to the cabin
subtasks: Position the door latch appropriately on the cabin's door frame.
Drill holes for screws or fasteners using a drill.
Secure the latch using screws or other fasteners.
Test the latch to ensure it functions correctly.

tasks.task: Walking the horse during a trail ride
subtasks: Mount the horse safely and securely.
Guide the horse along the designated trail.
Maintain a steady pace and direction.
Stop the horse as needed for rest or to follow the trail.
Dismount the horse safely at the end of the ride.

tasks.task: Checking the health and condition of a horse
subtasks: Approach the horse calmly and confidently.
Examine the horse's hooves for issues like thrush or other infections.
Check the horse's coat and skin for signs of parasites or injuries.
Observe the horse's behavior and demeanor for any abnormalities.

tasks.task: Feeding the horse
subtasks: Assemble the feed or hay.
Pick up and lead the horse to the feeding area.
Deliver the feed into the horse's mouth using a feed bucket or similar.
Allow the horse to eat for the allocated time.
Clean up any spilled feed and dispose of uneaten portions.

tasks.task: Harnessing the horse for work
subtasks: Gather the necessary harness components.
Attach the bridle to the horse's head.
Secure the collar or traces to the horse's harness.
Fasten the gear to the horse's body as necessary.
Check all attachments for security before starting work.

tasks.task: Suction cleaning a mineral tub
subtasks: Position the suction cleaner near the mineral tub.
Connect the cleaning tool to the suction device.
Thoroughly clean the mineral tub, removing any debris.
Verify all areas of the tub are clean and free of residue.
Replace the cover or return the tub to its proper place.

tasks.task: Driving the pickup truck over the tailgate to flip it
subtasks: Position the pickup truck adjacent to the tailgate.
Apply reverse gear to the pickup truck, rolling it backwards.
Release the tailgate to flip up over the truck bed.
Monitor the operation to ensure safety and proper flipping.

tasks.task: Hanging turkey nickers and crossing poles for mounting
subtasks: Measure and cut the necessary lengths for the turkey nickers.
Assemble the nickers by attaching the poles.
Hang the nickers from appropriate supports in the barn.
Install the crossing poles for additional mounting points.
Secure the poles and ensure they are stable for use.

tasks.task: Adjusting the battery on a pickup truck with a charger
subtasks: Locate the truck's battery and ensure it is accessible.
Connect the positive terminal of the charger to the battery's positive post.
Connect the negative terminal of the charger to a good ground.
Adjust the charger's settings if necessary (e.g., voltage, amperage).
Monitor the charging process and ensure safety.

tasks.task: Walking the horse for warming up before work
subtasks: Lead the horse out of its stall or pen.
Slowly walk the horse around the paddock or fields.
Allow the horse time to stretch and prepare for work.
Return the horse to its stall or pen once warmed up.

tasks.task: Leading a horse to the barn or paddock
subtasks: Approach the horse calmly and take the lead rope.
Walk the horse along the designated path.
Stop the horse at the desired location and release the lead.
Secure the horse if necessary, such as attaching the lead to a halter.

tasks.task: Torqueing the torque limiter on the shear blades
subtasks: Locate the torque limiter mechanism on the shears.
Apply the correct torque or tension as per specifications.
Check the torque limiter for proper engagement.
Tighten any necessary bolts or screws to secure the limiter.

tasks.task: Using a pulse to flip the tailgate
subtasks: Calculate the angle and force needed to flip the tailgate.
Position the horse or another object to apply a sharp impulse.
Apply a quick, forceful motion to the tailgate's pivot point.
Secure the tailgate once it flips to the up position.

tasks.task: Oiling the clevis pin on the shear blades
subtasks: Locate the clevis pin in the shears' mechanism.
Apply lubricant (e.g., oil) to the pin's surfaces.
Rotate the pin to ensure even coverage and penetration.
Wipe away excess lubricant and check for proper movement.

tasks.task: Placing hay in the horse's feed tub
subtasks: Retrieve the hay from storage.
Scoop the hay into the feed tub.
Position the tub so the horse can easily access the hay.
Check the amount of hay and adjust as needed.

tasks.task: Loading a pickup truck with a capstan and skids
subtasks: Position the capstan and skids near the truck bed.
Build a skid or ramp to load the machinery.
Secure the capstan onto the skids for stability.
Maneuver the capstan onto the skids and into the truck bed.
Align the capstan properly and secure it with straps or ties.

tasks.task: Welding a new triangle plate to the pasture fence
subtasks: Prepare the site by cleaning the area and laying a ground base.
Measure and mark the position for the new plate.
Cut the triangle plate to size with a plasma cutter.
Position the plate and align with existing fence components.
Weld the plate in place using an arc welder.

tasks.task: Setting up a trailer for a horse
subtasks: Check the trailer's condition and safety.
Position the trailer properly in relation to the mount point.
Secure the trailer to a hitch or other attachment point.
Arrange the interior of the trailer for the horse's comfort.
Open the trailer doors and ensure easy access for the horse.

tasks.task: Attaching a skid to a machine (likely a capstan)
subtasks: Examine the machine's current attachment points.
Attach the skid securely to the machine.
Ensure the skid is level and balanced.
Conduct a test run to confirm the attachment is safe.

tasks.task: Putting a torque limiter on the shear blades
subtasks: Examine the existing torque limiter, if any.
Install a torque limiter according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Tighten the securing bolts or screws for the limiter.
Test the heaviest possible load to check limiter engagement.

tasks.task: Driving the pickup truck onto a scale
subtasks: Position the truck on the scale's platform.
Start the engine and wait for the scale to stabilize.
Record the vehicle's weight.
Repeat as necessary with different configurations.

tasks.task: Prepping a pasture for predator control
subtasks: Survey the pasture for signs of predators.
Erect fences or obstacles around critical areas.
Introduce natural deterrents such as hay bales.
Check fences for any gaps or vulnerabilities.

tasks.task: Drilling holes for a GPS antenna
subtasks: Determine the ideal location for the GPS antenna.
Mark the hole positions using a laser or chalk line.
Drill holes into the structure for antenna mounting.
Mount the antenna in the drilled holes.

tasks.task: Unloading a machine (like a capstan) from a pickup truck
subtasks: Unlatch the machine from the truck's securing system.
Remove the machine from the truck bed carefully.
Lower the machine to the ground or stable surface.
Disassemble the skids or supports if necessary.

tasks.task: Inspecting shear blades for damage
subtasks: Turn off and unplug the shears.
Examine the blades for chips, cracks, or other damage.
Check the pivot points for wear or misalignment.
Address any issues found (e.g., replacing damaged parts).

tasks.task: Placing a skid under machinery
subtasks: Assess the machinery's stability needs.
Position the skid in the correct location.
Secure the machinery onto the skid.
Tamp down or stabilize the skid if necessary.

tasks.task: Operating a gasoline-powered toy tractor to drive around the barn
subtasks: Fuel the tractor with gasoline or a suitable fuel.
Start the tractor's engine and warm it up.
Drive the tractor around the barn or property, checking for issues.
Park the tractor safely when done and shut down the engine.

tasks.task: Adjusting the torque limiter on the other side of the shear blades
subtasks: Locate the opposite-side torque limiter mechanism.
Apply the correct torque or tension.
Secure the limiter in place and check for engagement.
Perform a dummy load test to verify proper functionality.

tasks.task: Attaching a GPS antenna to the machine's roof
subtasks: Confirm the machine is off and secure.
Position the antenna on the machine's roof at the optimal spot.
Secure the antenna using brackets or straps.
Ensure the antenna is properly aligned for signal reception.

tasks.task: Placing hay in a pile for storage
subtasks: Gather hay from the bales or storage area.
Stack the hay into a pile, using a pitchfork if needed.
Cover the pile with tarps or other protective covers.
Secure the covers to prevent moisture and pest damage.

tasks.task: Loading a tarp onto the pickup truck bed
subtasks: Unfold the tarp and position it at the truck bed's edge.
Secure the tarp to the bed using straps or ties.
Check that the tarp is even and won't slip during transport.
Close the pickup truck bed gate if applicable.

tasks.task: Controlling a horse with a pulse
subtasks: Identify the timing and force to apply a pulse.
Position the rider or handler's leg or hand to deliver the pulse.
Apply the pulse in a precise, controlled manner.

(Note: The original "SUBTASK:" for this might be too vague. "Subtasks within 'Controlling a horse with a pulse'": How exactly is the 'pulse' delivered? If using a leg cue or hand cue, the subtasks could include positioning the limb and applying pressure. But since the video transcript didn't specify, the exact subtasks here might not be clear.)

tasks.task: Disassembling a new engine
subtasks: Identify and remove all parts from the engine assembly.
Clean and document each component for future reassembly.
Store disassembled parts in a secure location.

tasks.task: Cultivating the pasture with a snow plow
subtasks: Attach the snow plow to the tractor or vehicle.
Navigate the plow through the pasture, clearing snow as needed.
Check the plow's angle and depth to avoid excessive damage.
Store the plow properly after use.

tasks.task: Releasing the tailgate when needed
subtasks: Determine the correct moment to release the tailgate.
Place a stable surface or handbrake to hold the tailgate steady.
Release the tailgate's locking mechanism.
Verify the tailgate remains secure in its up position after release.

tasks.task: (Position missing in transcript): Having a welding rod in a welding rod holder
subtasks: Identify the welding rod holder's mechanism.
Load the welding rod into the holder.
Adjust the holder to maintain proper rod position.
Use the holder to feed the rod into the arc during welding.

tasks.task: Storing hay bales in a circular silo
subtasks: Assemble the silo structure if necessary.
Position the hay bales near the silo's access point.
Lower the bales into the silo, ensuring proper stacking.
Seal the bale(s) within the silo to maintain freshness.
